name: grunt-git-authors
description: Generate a list of authors from the git history.
readme:
# grunt-git-authors

A [grunt](https://github.com/cowboy/grunt) plugin for generating a list of authors from the git history.

## API

### Tasks

#### authors

Generates a list of authors in the form "Name <email>" in order of first contribution.
